General.Name: Wedge Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Wedge Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of micro-ecological live bacteria products, superalloys, and related products in China. The company operates through Microecological Preparations, and Superalloy and its Products segments. It offers micro-ecological preparations, such as Golden Bifido products, which are bifidobacterium lactobacillus triple live bacteria tablets; Dingjunsheng vaginal lactobacillus live capsules; and Golden Shuangqi drug to treat diarrhea and constipation caused by intestinal flora imbalance. It also offers Jianyue Bacteria dietary supplements; and Triple Probiotic Powder health food, probiotic toothpastes, probiotic hand creams, etc. In addition, the company provides high-temperature alloy materials and core components, such as precision casting blades, superalloy powder discs, high temperature master alloys, and their alloy powders; and metal testing. and processing services. Further, it engages in real estate development business. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Wanze Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wedge Industrial Co., Ltd. in May 2013. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shantou, China.
General.Address: Building B, Guangming Building, Shantou, China, 515041
